description:
At Taneshima`s behest, Sota and Inami go on their first date. Though nervous, Inami arrives dressed to kill, whereas Sota arrives anticipating that he might just get killed. Oh, and meet another member of the staff who has been there all along!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Date to Iu Na no "Kessen", Takanashi to Inami no Sore kara...
Date, the Final Showdown. Takanashi and Inami Ever After...
デートと言う名の"決戦", 小鳥遊と伊波のそれから...
